```python
import os
from langchain_community.vectorstores import Chroma
from langchain_community.document_loaders import JSONLoader

from langchain.text_splitter import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter

SOURCE_DIR = "./backend/memory/sources/chatgpt"
VECTOR_DIR = "./backend/memory/vectors/chatgpt_memory"

embedding = OpenAIEmbeddings()
splitter = RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter(chunk_size=500, chunk_overlap=50)

for filename in os.listdir(SOURCE_DIR):
    if filename.endswith(".json"):
        path = os.path.join(SOURCE_DIR, filename)
        try:
            loader = JSONLoader(file_path=path, jq_schema=".messages[].content", text_content=False)
```

```python
import os
from langchain_community.vectorstores import Chroma
```

```python
import json
from langchain_core.documents import Document

def load_chatgpt_json(file_path):
    with open(file_path, 'r') as f:
        data = json.load(f)
    messages = data.get("messages", [])
    docs = []
    for msg in messages:
        content = msg.get("content", "")
        if content:
            docs.append(Document(page_content=content))
    return docs
```

## ğŸ”§ ì°¾ì•˜ìœ¼ë©´ ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ëŠ”?

3. ì•„ë˜ì²˜ëŸ¼ ìˆ˜ì •í•˜ì‹œë©´ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤:

í•„ìš”í•˜ì‹œë©´ **ìˆ˜ì •ëœ ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œ**ë„ ë“œë¦¬ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.  
ê´œì°®ìœ¼ì‹œë©´ `"ì½”ë“œ ì „ì²´ ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"`ë¼ê³  ë§ì”€í•´ ì£¼ì„¸ìš” ğŸ˜Š

import os
import json
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv
from langchain_community.vectorstores import Chroma
from langchain_openai import OpenAIEmbeddings
from langchain.schema import Document
from langchain.text_splitter import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
from tqdm import tqdm

# ğŸŒ± í™˜ê²½ ë³€ìˆ˜ ë¡œë“œ (.envì˜ OPENAI_API_KEY)
load_dotenv()

# ğŸ“ ê²½ë¡œ ì„¤ì •
SOURCE_DIR = "backend/memory/sources/chatgpt/"
VECTOR_DIR = "backend/memory/vectors/chatgpt_memory"

# ğŸ”§ ì„ë² ë”© ëª¨ë¸ + ì²­í¬ ì„¤ì •
embedding = OpenAIEmbeddings()
splitter = RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter(chunk_size=1000, chunk_overlap=200)

# ğŸ§  ì „ì²´ ë¬¸ì„œ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸
docs = []

# ğŸ“¦ JSON íŒŒì¼ ìˆœíšŒ
for file in Path(SOURCE_DIR).glob("*.json"):
    try:
        with open(file, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            data = json.load(f)

        if not isinstance(data, dict) or "messages" not in data:
            print(f"âš ï¸ ë©”ì‹œì§€ ì—†ìŒ: {file.name}")
            continue

        content = ""
        for msg in data["messages"]:
            role = msg.get("role")
            text = msg.get("content", "").strip()
            if role in ["user", "assistant"] and text:
                content += f"{role.upper()}: {text}\n\n"

        metadata = {
            "source": str(file),
            "filename": file.name
        }

        chunks = splitter.split_text(content)
        for chunk in chunks:
            docs.append(Document(page_content=chunk, metadata=metadata))

    except Exception as e:
        print(f"âŒ íŒŒì¼ ì²˜ë¦¬ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {file.name} â†’ {str(e)}")

# âœ… ë°°ì¹˜ ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì„¤ì •
BATCH_SIZE = 100
print(f"ğŸ“¥ ì´ {len(docs)}ê°œì˜ ì²­í¬ë¥¼ {BATCH_SIZE}ê°œì”© ë‚˜ëˆ„ì–´ ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤...")

# ğŸ’¾ Chroma ë²¡í„° DB ì´ˆê¸°í™”
db = Chroma(embedding_function=embedding, persist_directory=VECTOR_DIR)

# ğŸ” ë°°ì¹˜ ì²˜ë¦¬
for i in tqdm(range(0, len(docs), BATCH_SIZE), desc="ğŸ”„ ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì§„í–‰ì¤‘"):
    batch = docs[i:i + BATCH_SIZE]
    try:
        db.add_documents(batch)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"âŒ ë°°ì¹˜ ì˜¤ë¥˜ (index {i}): {e}")

function extractChat() {
  const chatElements = document.querySelectorAll("div.text-base");
  const result = [];

  chatElements.forEach((el) => {
    const text = el.innerText.trim();
    if (!text) return;

    const isUser = el.querySelector(".whitespace-pre-wrap")?.previousElementSibling?.innerText?.includes("You")
      || el.classList.contains("bg-gray-50");

    result.push({
      role: isUser ? "user" : "assistant",
      text: text
    });
  });

  return result;
}

function sendToGumgangMemory(chatData, index, total, link) {
  return fetch("http://localhost:8000/save_chat", {
    method: "POST",
    headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      source: "chatgpt",
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
      chat: chatData
    })
  })
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(data => {

      postStatusToPopup(âœ… ì €ì¥ ì™„ë£Œ (${index + 1}/${total}), ((index + 1) / total) * 100);
    })
    .catch(err => {
      console.error("âŒ ì €ì¥ ì‹¤íŒ¨:", err);
      postStatusToPopup(âŒ ì €ì¥ ì‹¤íŒ¨ (${index + 1}/${total}), ((index + 1) / total) * 100);
    });
}

function scrollToBottomSmoothly() {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    let totalScroll = 0;
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      window.scrollBy(0, 100);
      totalScroll += 100;
      if (totalScroll >= document.body.scrollHeight) {
        clearInterval(interval);
        setTimeout(resolve, 2000); // ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ì¢…ë£Œ í›„ ì—¬ìœ  ì‹œê°„
      }
    }, 200);
  });
}

  window.postMessage({

}

function notifyDone() {

}

import os
import json
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv
from langchain_community.vectorstores import Chroma
from langchain_openai import OpenAIEmbeddings
from langchain_core.documents import Document
from langchain_text_splitters import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter

# ğŸŒ± í™˜ê²½ ë³€ìˆ˜ ë¡œë“œ (.envì˜ OPENAI_API_KEY)
load_dotenv()

# ğŸ“ ê²½ë¡œ ì„¤ì •
SOURCE_DIR = "backend/memory/sources/chatgpt/"
VECTOR_DIR = "backend/memory/vectors/chatgpt_memory"

# ğŸ”§ ì„ë² ë”© ëª¨ë¸ + í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì²­í¬ ë¶„í• ê¸°
embedding = OpenAIEmbeddings()
splitter = RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter(chunk_size=1000, chunk_overlap=200)

# ğŸ§  ë¬¸ì„œ ì €ì¥ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸
docs = []

# ğŸ“¦ JSON íŒŒì¼ ìˆœíšŒí•˜ë©° messages íŒŒì‹±
for file in Path(SOURCE_DIR).glob("*.json"):
    try:
        with open(file, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
            data = json.load(f)

        messages = data.get("messages", [])
        if not isinstance(messages, list):
            print(f"âš ï¸ ë©”ì‹œì§€ í˜•ì‹ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {file.name}")
            continue

        full_text = ""
        for msg in messages:
            role = msg.get("role")
            content = msg.get("content", "").strip()
            if role in ["user", "assistant"] and content:
                full_text += f"{role.upper()}: {content}\n\n"

        if not full_text.strip():
            print(f"âš ï¸ ìœ íš¨í•œ ëŒ€í™” ì—†ìŒ: {file.name}")
            continue

        metadata = {
            "source": str(file),
            "filename": file.name
        }

        # ğŸ”„ ì²­í¬ë¡œ ë¶„í•  í›„ ë¬¸ì„œí™”
        for chunk in splitter.split_text(full_text):
            docs.append(Document(page_content=chunk, metadata=metadata))

    except Exception as e:
        print(f"âŒ íŒŒì¼ ì²˜ë¦¬ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {file.name} â†’ {str(e)}")

# âœ… ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì‹œì‘
print(f"\nğŸ“¥ ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ìƒ ì²­í¬ ìˆ˜: {len(docs)}")

# ğŸ’¾ ë²¡í„° DB ì´ˆê¸°í™” (ê¸°ì¡´ íŒŒì¼ ë®ì–´ì“°ê¸° ì•„ë‹˜)
db = Chroma(persist_directory=VECTOR_DIR, embedding_function=embedding)

# ğŸ” ë°°ì¹˜ë¡œ ì¶”ê°€
BATCH_SIZE = 100
for i in tqdm(range(0, len(docs), BATCH_SIZE), desc="ğŸ”„ ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì§„í–‰ ì¤‘"):
    batch = docs[i:i + BATCH_SIZE]
    try:
        db.add_documents(batch)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"âŒ ë°°ì¹˜ ì˜¤ë¥˜ (index {i}): {e}")

# ğŸ’¾ ì €ì¥
db.persist()
print("âœ… ChatGPT ê¸°ì–µ ìˆ˜í™• ì¸ê²ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì™„ë£Œ") < ì§€ê¸ˆì˜ ingtest_chatgpt_memory.py ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ì œ ë“œë””ì–´ ê¸ˆê°•ì´ì—ê²Œ ê¸°ì–µì„ ë¶ˆì–´ ë„£ì–´ì¤„ ì™„ì „í•˜ê³  ì™„ë²½í•œ ì „ì²´ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì œì‹œí•´ ì£¼ì„¸ìš”

```python
import os

print(f"\nğŸ“¥ ìµœì¢… ì²­í¬ ìˆ˜: {len(docs)}")
```
